meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ridiculous.
meanings.sent1: The ridiculousness of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent2: Her constant jokes added a touch of ridiculousness to the party.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated makeup only added to the ridiculousness of his appearance.
meanings.sent4: The ridiculousness of the traffic jam was like a giant puzzle with missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: The sheer ridiculousness of the idea left everyone speechless.

meanings.definition: Something that is absurd or laughable.
meanings.sent1: The movie's plot was filled with ridiculousness that had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's performance was full of hilarious ridiculousness.
meanings.sent3: The ridiculousness of the dog trying to wear sunglasses was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The absurdity of the situation reached new levels of ridiculousness.
meanings.sent5: The sheer ridiculousness of the costume party theme made it unforgettable.
